DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if a Spanish-language HIV and HIV test information video is as effective in delivering basic information regarding HIV and HIV tests to primarily Spanish-speaking HIV test recipients as an in-person presentation with an HIV test counselor.
DOC.brief_title: Video-Based Delivery of HIV Test Information for Spanish-Speaking Latinos
DOC.criteria: 1864 years of age Selfidentify as Latino Able to give informed consent Spanish speaking Intoxicated Being treated for acute psychiatric illness Mental incapacitation Significant visual or hearing impairment Prisoner or under home confinement Participating in HIV vaccine trial Critically ill
